Text: Quick download. Can't wait for the next upload :D

Great!! This one didn't freeze. This is the one to get. The other two uploads of this game both froze after the second quarter but not this one, so far.
Keeping my fingers crossed. Thanks for the upload.
If you're having trouble with ghosting, try to burn them it to DVD. I think the DVD player is faster, and it played perfectly when I burnt this for a friend.
